Uses of Package
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app

  • Packages that use com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app 
    Package Description
    com.smartnsoft.droid4me.analytics
    Useful when it comes to handle analytics reporting in an industrial way.
    com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app
    Contains all the Activity basis classes, an Android Application class, and some classes useful to activities.
    com.smartnsoft.droid4me.debug
    This package contains components dedicated to the debug and development of an application.
    com.smartnsoft.droid4me.support.v4.app  
  • Classes in com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app used by com.smartnsoft.droid4me.analytics 
    Class and Description
    ActivityController.IssueAnalyzer
    Responsible for analyzing issues resulting from Throwable entities.
  • Classes in com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app used by com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app 
    Class and Description
    AbstractSmartListActivity
    Deprecated. 
    AbstractWrappedSmartListActivity
    Deprecated. 
    ActivityController
    Is responsible for intercepting an activity starting and redirect it to a prerequisite one if necessary, and for handling globally exceptions.
    ActivityController.ExceptionHandler
    Defines and splits the handling of various exceptions in a single place.
    ActivityController.Interceptor
    An interface which is queried during the various life cycle events of a LifeCycle.
    ActivityController.Interceptor.InterceptorEvent
    Defines all the events handled by the ActivityController.Interceptor.
    ActivityController.IssueAnalyzer
    Responsible for analyzing issues resulting from Throwable entities.
    ActivityController.Redirector
    An interface which is requested when a new Activity is bound to be started.
    ActivityController.SystemServiceProvider
    An interface responsible for providing Android system services, given their name.
    AppPublics.BroadcastListener
    This interface is a wrapper around a regular Android native BroadcastReceiver, by capturing the Context.registerReceiver(android.content.BroadcastReceiver, IntentFilter) invocation and implementation is one place.
    AppPublics.ComponentBroadcastListener
    A broadcast listener which listens only to AppPublics.UI_LOAD_ACTION intents.
    AppPublics.LifeCyclePublic
    Because an Android Activity/Fragment entity can be destroyed and then recreated, following a configuration change (a screen orientation change, for instance), this interface gives information about an entity life cycle.
    AppPublics.MultiSelectionHandler.OnMultiSelectionChanged
    The interface which is invoked by the AppPublics.MultiSelectionHandler when a new selection event occurs.
    ExceptionHandlers.AbstractExceptionHandler
    A simple implementation of ExceptionHandlers.ExceptionHandler which pops-up error dialog boxes and toasts.
    ExceptionHandlers.AbstractExceptionHandler.ConnectivityUIExperience
    Defines how the framework should behave when an Internet connectivity problem has been detected.
    ProgressHandler
    Provides a way to handle progress in an application, while it is computed something and the end-user is prompted to wait until a task completion.
    Smartable
    All activities and fragments entities of the framework must at least implement this composite interface.
    SmartableActivity
    All activities of the framework must at least implement this interface.
    SmartActivity
    The basis class for all activities available in the framework.
    SmartApplication.I18N
    Contains various attributes in order to have the default dialog boxes related to exceptions i18ned.
    SmartCommands.AbstractSimpleGuardedCommand
    A handy SmartCommands.GuardedCommand which will issue systematically a log when an exception occurs during the command execution, and will trigger a SmartCommands.GuardedException which wraps the original exception in that case.
    SmartCommands.GuardedCommand
    A Runnable used as command, which is allowed to throw an exception during its execution.
    SmartCommands.GuardedHandler
    Defines a single contract which enables to turn an exception into another one.
    SmartCommands.SimpleGuardedCommand
    A handy SmartCommands.AbstractSimpleGuardedCommand dedicated to activities.
    SmartCommands.SmartThreadPoolExecutor
    Introduced so as to be able to catch the exceptions thrown in the framework thread pools.
    Smarted
    Defines some common methods for all Activity and Fragment entities defined in the framework.
    SmartFragment
    A basis classes for designing a Fragment compatible with the framework, i.e. droid4me-ready.
  • Classes in com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app used by com.smartnsoft.droid4me.debug 
    Class and Description
    ActivityController.Interceptor
    An interface which is queried during the various life cycle events of a LifeCycle.
    ActivityController.Interceptor.InterceptorEvent
    Defines all the events handled by the ActivityController.Interceptor.
  • Classes in com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app used by com.smartnsoft.droid4me.support.v4.app 
    Class and Description
    AppPublics.BroadcastListener
    This interface is a wrapper around a regular Android native BroadcastReceiver, by capturing the Context.registerReceiver(android.content.BroadcastReceiver, IntentFilter) invocation and implementation is one place.
    AppPublics.LifeCyclePublic
    Because an Android Activity/Fragment entity can be destroyed and then recreated, following a configuration change (a screen orientation change, for instance), this interface gives information about an entity life cycle.
    Smartable
    All activities and fragments entities of the framework must at least implement this composite interface.
    SmartableActivity
    All activities of the framework must at least implement this interface.
    Smarted
    Defines some common methods for all Activity and Fragment entities defined in the framework.
